name: ITP - Enabling Works - Timber Retaining Wall
template name: Generic - Bus Infrastructure - ITP - Enabling Works - Timber Retaining Wall

name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Site Set out as per construction plan provided with GPS location and 3D model provided by designers.
VERIFICATION ACTIVITY: AT and FH Project Managers
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Site Set out Plan
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Site Set out as per IFC plan with reference/set out points provided by designers.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM ST0004 - Version A Timber Retaining Wall Detail
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 125 x 125 H5 Timber Posts @ 1.5m centres installed with 20MPA concrete. Concrete footing to be 325mm diameter.
○ 150 x 50 RS Tanalised H4 Timber Rails. Provide 5-10mm gap between rails
○ Retaining wall slope to be 10:1 grade. Maximum height of wall = 1499mm.
○ Minimum embedded depth of post to be same as exposed height unless less than 300mm, then depth = 300mm
○ Backfill width of 200mm of Drainage metal behind retaining wall pails.
RECORDS: Photos Material Dockets Dimension checks
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As built drawings and Ramm Sheets Completed
